query:
ALTER TABLE cost_records 
ADD COLUMN batchNumber VARCHAR(50) AFTER skuId,
ADD COLUMN quantityProduced DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0 AFTER batchNumber,
ADD COLUMN unit VARCHAR(10) DEFAULT 'kg' AFTER quantityProduced,
ADD COLUMN directCostTotal DECIMAL(12,2) DEFAULT 0 AFTER unit,
ADD COLUMN directCostDetails JSON AFTER directCostTotal,
ADD COLUMN indirectCostTotal DECIMAL(12,2) DEFAULT 0 AFTER directCostDetails,
ADD COLUMN indirectCostDetails JSON AFTER indirectCostTotal,
ADD COLUMN laborCostTotal DECIMAL(12,2) DEFAULT 0 AFTER indirectCostDetails,
ADD COLUMN laborCostDetails JSON AFTER laborCostTotal,
ADD COLUMN destinationId INT AFTER laborCostDetails,
ADD COLUMN freightCost DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0 AFTER destinationId,
ADD COLUMN taxCost DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0 AFTER freightCost,
ADD COLUMN otherVariableCosts DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0 AFTER taxCost,
ADD COLUMN otherVariableCostsDescription TEXT AFTER otherVariableCosts,
ADD COLUMN wastagePercent DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0 AFTER otherVariableCostsDescription,
ADD COLUMN wastageValue DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0 AFTER wastagePercent,
ADD COLUMN totalCost DECIMAL(12,2) DEFAULT 0 AFTER wastageValue,
ADD COLUMN unitCost DECIMAL(10,4) DEFAULT 0 AFTER totalCost,
ADD COLUMN sellingPrice DECIMAL(10,2) AFTER unitCost,
ADD COLUMN grossMargin DECIMAL(10,2) AFTER sellingPrice,
ADD COLUMN grossMarginPercent DECIMAL(5,2) AFTER grossMargin,
ADD COLUMN status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'rascunho' AFTER grossMarginPercent,
ADD COLUMN observations TEXT AFTER status;

ADD COLUMN wastageValue DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0 AFTER wastagePercent,
ADD COLUMN totalCost DECIMAL(12,2) DEFAULT 0 AFTER wastageValue,
